pages.text: $(bgreen)Doom Shroom$() thinks you're lucky on its side, because it could destroy everything you hold dear. It wouldn't be hard.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)250$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Super Slow$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)instant-kill$() plant, which will make a $(bred)high explosion damage$() to all enemies in $(l)21 * 21$() area after planted. $(bred)It will sleep at daytime$().
